Class Question

The Question class represents a question in a system. This class includes properties related to question details like Id, QuestionText, TopicId and a list of the answers. There are two constructors available: a default one which initializes properties with default values, and a parameterized one which allows all properties to be set. Provides a FromJson method to create a Rank object from a JSON string.

Question(Int32, String, Int32, List<Answer>)

Initializes a new instance of the Question class with the specified identifier, question text, topic identifier and list of answers.

Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 id

The identifier of the Question.
System.String questionText

The text of the Question.
System.Int32 topicId

The identifier of the Topic relevant to the Question.
System.Collections.Generic.List<Answer> answers

The list of Answers associated with the Question.
